Function Documentation

template<typename First, typename Second>
First& ref_cast (  Second &  value  ) 
 

Will cast the incoming reference value to a non-cost reference.

The in and out values must be copyable between each other, else the compilation will fail.

Parameters:
value Incoming reference value.
Returns:
Non-const reference value.
